urls.description: Thousands of pediatricians convened in Anaheim, Calif., in early October for the American Academy of Pediatrics’s (AAP) annual conference. urls.title: The Hijacking of Pediatric Medicine
urls.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics claims to support the health of all children. Many doctors are appalled by its prescriptions.

data.text:
One MD says: "The reason to trust modern doctors over ancient healers is that more of what we tell you to do is justified by well-done studies. But how do we hold that perch when we just make stuff up?"

Read @aaronsibarium on the corruption of pediatrics: https://t.co/T1Mv9DXP5q

urls.title: Bibi's Back: A Conversation With Israel's New Prime Minister
urls.description: 'How many leaders have come back from political death, not once, but twice? I've come back. The question is: what am I coming back for?'

data.text:
"Somebody slipped me a note the other day that said, 'How many leaders come back from political death, not once, but twice?' In the last 75 years, no one has. 

I've come back. The question is, what am I coming back for?"

@bariweiss with @netanyahu

tweets.text: Honest. Independent. Fearless. #thinkforyourself https://t.co/g4oc7uUngj https://t.co/bY3EXUjlDj

Why I joined @thefp: 

I knew I didn’t fit in when Politico let @benshapiro guest write an edition of Playbook. I told a colleague I was stoked because “this helps legitimize us.” They responded that they were taking a mental health day to process ‘Shapirogate.’
This is the next step in the evolution from @bariweiss ‘s Common Sense.  Am thrilled to be part of @thefp team and be part of the journey! https://t.co/PRrhbNTo4G

Our team was given extensive, unfiltered access to Twitter's internal communication and systems. One of the things we wanted to know was whether Twitter systemically suppressed political speech.

Here's what we found: https://t.co/Gjb397fnSr

urls.title: Election Night in Arizona: ‘MAGA Is Not The Way It Used to Be’
urls.description: Waiting for the red wave among Kari Lake’s supporters in Scottsdale.

tweets.text:

That’s not what happened.

@petersavodnik on the red wave that wasn't.
